goal: Create comprehensive unit tests in test_calculator.py covering all calculator functions

rules.name: Test Addition Function
rules.condition: When testing the addition function of the calculator
rules.action: Write test cases to cover positive, negative, and zero values
rules.expected_outcome: All addition scenarios are correctly tested

rules.name: Test Subtraction Function
rules.condition: When testing the subtraction function of the calculator
rules.action: Write test cases to cover positive, negative, and zero values
rules.expected_outcome: All subtraction scenarios are correctly tested

rules.name: Test Multiplication Function
rules.condition: When testing the multiplication function of the calculator
rules.action: Write test cases to cover positive, negative, and zero values
rules.expected_outcome: All multiplication scenarios are correctly tested

rules.name: Test Division Function
rules.condition: When testing the division function of the calculator
rules.action: Write test cases to cover division by zero and normal division scenarios
rules.expected_outcome: All division scenarios are correctly tested, including error handling for division by zero

rules.name: Test Edge Cases
rules.condition: When all basic functions have been tested
rules.action: Write additional test cases to cover edge cases such as maximum and minimum values
rules.expected_outcome: Edge cases are identified and tested
